text:
Hi All, we are looking for two people who are experienced with the HubSpot API, integration with business tools, like Xero and Power BI and ERPs plus experienced building out custom objects on HubSpot Enterprise.

We have just launched :rocket: as a HubSpot partner agency and would like to have one or two trusted developers on our books to give all work to. There will be the opportunity to move onto a retained contract as the work increases - if that is what you are looking for.

If you are a senior technical consultant and are looking to take on a head of HubSpot Architecture role, we would like to hear from you too. 

For the freelancers we are seeking one in Europe the Other in the US time zone. 

We are not currently looking for CMS / Marketing template or frontend developers. We are focused 100% on backend.
